mapper.select: select count(*) from information_schema.tables where table_schema = (select database()) and table_name = #{tableName}
select * from information_schema.columns where table_schema = (select database()) and table_name = #{tableName} order by ordinal_position

SELECT t.table_name AS tableName, t.table_comment AS tableComment, t.create_time AS createTime, t.update_time AS updateTime, c.update_time AS configTime FROM information_schema.tables t LEFT JOIN t_code_generator_config c ON t.table_name = c.table_name WHERE t.table_schema = (SELECT DATABASE())
AND INSTR(t.table_name, #{queryForm.tableNameKeywords})
